ResumeParserData.Experience: Lloyds Banking Group  Performance Manager  September 2017 - Present  Manchester, UK  As a Performance Manager at Lloyds, I oversee the monitoring and analysis of business performance across multiple departments. I conduct comprehensive data analysis using tools like Excel and Tableau, generating insights that inform strategic decisions. My role involves collaborating with stakeholders to gather performance metrics and develop performance improvement strategies. I also lead initiatives to optimize business processes, achieving significant efficiency gains.  Barclays UK  Senior Performance Analyst  July 2014 - August 2017  Manchester, UK  At Barclays, I was responsible for analyzing business performance and identifying areas for improvement. I conducted detailed data analysis and prepared performance reports for senior management. I worked closely with various departments to gather performance data and develop strategies to enhance operational efficiency. My role also involved leading process improvement projects, resulting in improved business performance.
